Uses of Package
utilities

  • Packages that use utilities 
    Package Description
    experiments  
    interfaces  
    servlets  
    utilities  
  • Classes in utilities used by experiments 
    Class and Description
    ControlClass
    Hard-Coded Control classes should extend HardCodedControlClass.
    ControlClass.RBNBControl
    This inner class is meant to provide the base functionality for classes that extend HardCodedControlClass Normally, an experiment will extend HCCC and have an inner class that extends HCCC.RBNBControl This way, the experiment specific code only has to override the run() and include the necessary control logic within that method where all the backend processes (connecting to RBNB, sending commands) are handled by this class
  • Classes in utilities used by interfaces 
    Class and Description
    Rule
    A 'Rule' in the segaWeb Portal is the bit of logic that dictates how an experiment behaves.
  • Classes in utilities used by servlets 
    Class and Description
    Experiment
    The experiment class is used as an object wrapper to provide access to a control program.
    SegaLogger
    SegaLogger Class.
  • Classes in utilities used by utilities 
    Class and Description
    ControlClass.RBNBControl
    This inner class is meant to provide the base functionality for classes that extend HardCodedControlClass Normally, an experiment will extend HCCC and have an inner class that extends HCCC.RBNBControl This way, the experiment specific code only has to override the run() and include the necessary control logic within that method where all the backend processes (connecting to RBNB, sending commands) are handled by this class
    Rule
    A 'Rule' in the segaWeb Portal is the bit of logic that dictates how an experiment behaves.
    SegaLogger
    SegaLogger Class.
